Bartlett.WMQM:
WMQM is an American Christian radio station in Lakeland, Tennessee (Memphis broadcast market), broadcasting with 50,000 watts day and 35 watts night at 1600 AM. WMQM is a sister station to shortwave radio station WWCR (World Wide Christian Radio). WMQM is owned and operated by F. W. Robbert Broadcasting, Inc.


== History ==
In 1955, WKBK AM 1600 signed on in Milan, Tennessee operated by Milan Broadcasting Company, Inc.
